nodes.documentation:
@title Market factory contract - Allows to create market contracts
 @author Stefan George - <stefan@gnosis.pm>
nodes.name: StandardMarket
StandardMarket

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows to fund the market with collateral tokens converting them into outcome tokens
 @param _funding Funding amount
nodes.name: fund

nodes.documentation: @dev Allows market creator to close the markets by transferring all remaining outcome tokens to the creator
nodes.name: close

nodes.documentation:
@dev Allows market creator to withdraw fees generated by trades
 @return Fee amount
nodes.name: withdrawFees
buy
sell
shortSell
calcMarketFee
